content.raw:
I'm trying to parse the Polylines, about the geomtry of the visual, there are some options with threejs, we can visualize them using the `TubeGeomerty` for example, or we can build using some `BoxGeometry`s across the lines which would look kinda similar to the `gazebo` polylines.

Here is my progress so far 
![hoopred1.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/583490571-hoopred1.png)

![hoopred.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/1475185738-hoopred.png)

Also, the `hoop (red)` model was the only model that I found that uses the `polylines`, there is not other models that uses `polylines` right?
